attributes.action: Hold a national referendum on the Television license fee
attributes.additional_details:
2017/18 data shows that 25,836,495 households pay the TV license fee, 
15.1m Households in the U.K. Use Pay TV services such as Sky & Virgin, 15.4m households use streaming services such as Netflix & Amazon Prime (BARB survey data)

We are paying over the odds for Television & wish for a referendum to be held on the TV licence fee
attributes.background:
The Television license fee is compulsory for almost all UK households who watch any program online or on TV, We want a referendum held within 2 years to give the people of the United Kingdom the choice on its future.

Should the TV license be scrapped? Yes/No
